title: Ticket #5691: Expose condor_annex's mechanism(s) for bulk VM requests.
description:
As part of our general desire to provide mechanisms (and not just solutions, especially for some as complicated as condor_annex), be sure to expose the bulk VM request mechanism. (Even though the EC2 GAHP now scales to 10,000 instances, it takes quite a while to do so.)

As part of our general approach to implementing condor_annex, we will be creating a daemon which manages the annexes and the associated hard state. It should not be difficult to expose, via a daemon core command (very similar to the one used to create a full annex, if not actually that command with a specific flag) the mechanism we use for bulk VM requests.

(Not report 86.)
